column5: Your stay will be in a comfortable and cozy fully renovated 1970's Airstream Landyacht, fully rebuilt to create a warm and welcoming space. Relax on a comfortable queen-sized bed with premium bedding. Wake to a fresh cup of coffee and local breakfast treats. Enjoy your full-service shower, bathroom, and kitchen basics such as microwave and fridge. Settle down into a quiet reading nook. Being 3 miles from downtown Fredericksburg, a short drive will put you right in the middle of it all!
